text.author: Wikivoyage community (see URL)
text.title: Maroochydore
text.p:
Maroochydore
is a city on the
Sunshine Coast
of
Queensland
.

p.s:
See
Sunshine Coast guide
for how to get into the region .
Car is by far the easiest way to see most attractions in a short amount of time , or at your own pace .
Larger car hire companies may offer relocations to Brisbane Airport or the Gold Coast .
Try the major national renters with services at Maroochy Airport or other local independents that hire new cars .
The Sunshine Coast is part of the south east Queensland translink area .
Sunshine Plaza is a hub for the bus services in the area .

list.item:
Walk across the Maroochy River bridge to
Chambers Island

Marcoola Markets
, 10 Lorraine Avenue , Marcoola .
Farmer 's market with street food and music .
Held every Fridays from 4pm to 8pm .

Sunshine Plaza
, Horton Parade , ☏ +61 -7-5443-4133 .
A shopping mall with large outdoor areas around a waterway .
Normal chain stores are represented , but there are also paddle boats and quite a few eateries alfresco style .

Pig ' N ' Whistle Sunshine Plaza
.
Brews their own IPA , available on tap .
A rare find in Australia .

Banyandah Towers
, 150 Duporth Ave. , ☏ +617 5443-6911 .
3.5 star apartment

Maroochy River Resort & Bungalows
( Maroochy River Bungalows ) , 38-46 David Low Way , Maroochydore ( behind the Waterfront Hotel & BWS ) , ☏ +61754484911 .
Check-in : 2PM , check-out : 10AM .
Self contained family holiday cabins .
Private boat ramp , kayaks , tennis , bbqs , pools , sunlounges .
Close to the action but away from the rat race .
$ 350 - 1400 per week .

The Sebel Maroochydore
, 20
Aerodrome Road , ☏ +61754798000 .
Apartment-style accommodation on Maroochydore beach , views of the beach , river and hinterland .

p.s: There is free internet at the Library .

list.item:
Maroochydore Towing Service
Accident and emergency vehicle recovery , Sunshine Coast areas 24hr service .
